sentences.english: Virtually all output products are sold in the Nenets Autonomous District.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有的输出产品都销往Nenets自治区。

sentences.english: Liu Yaohua was relieved from the post as Chief of the Bureau of Public Security of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 免去柳耀华新疆维吾尔自治区公安厅厅长职务。

sentences.english: A municipality has no power save those conferred upon it by the laws of the state.
sentences.chinese: 自治区除国家法律授给的权力以外没有任何权力。

sentences.english: All four cases are from Hotan Prefecture, Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, China.
sentences.chinese: 所有四个病例都来自中国新疆维吾尔自治区和田地区。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments designated by the autonomous region government.
sentences.chinese: 承办自治区人民政府交办的其他事项。

sentences.english: This article introduces the conceptual planning of Dongxing City in Guangxi Region.
sentences.chinese: 该文介绍了广西壮族自治区东兴市的概念规划。

sentences.english: Mongols live in Mongolia autonomous region. They like wrestling.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古族人居住在内蒙古自治区，喜欢摔跤。

sentences.english: Note:Data in this table comes from the Land and Resources Department.
sentences.chinese: 本表数据来源于自治区国土资源厅。

sentences.english: Iraq's self-ruled Kurdish region has started exporting crude oil for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克库尔德自治区开始首次出口原油。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments designated by the autonomous government.
sentences.chinese: 承办自治区人民政府交办的其他事项。

sentences.english: Furong Ancient Town Furong Town or Hibiscus Town is located Yongshun County of Western Hunan Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉古镇位于土家和苗族自治区西部的永顺县。

sentences.english: Studies on the freshwater fishes of Maoer mountain nature reserve;
sentences.chinese: 猫儿山自然保护区位于广西壮族自治区东北部。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments designated by the regional government and state commerce bureau.
sentences.chinese: 承担自治区人民政府和国家商务部交办的其他事项。

sentences.english: Chestnut soil is one of the main types of soil in Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 栗钙土是内蒙古自治区最重要的一种土壤类型。

sentences.english: Autonomous region party committee secretary Chen Jianguo presides over the conference.
sentences.chinese: 自治区党委书记陈建国主持会议。

sentences.english: This research is one of programs of Natural Science Fundation Committee of Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 本研究是内蒙古自治区自然科学基金课题。
